There was no integration build on 20020402. The latest one was on 20020404. 
Please try to reproduce the problem in an integration build. If you can 
reproduce it please reopen the bug.

Actually for two days Apr 2,3 build 20020402 was both the integration and 
nightly build. Nevertheless I downloaded 20020404 build and after working much 
better for a while I got the following error upon formatting (I had tabs tuned 
off and used 4 spaces, otherwise it was largely the default settings):
